title: COINAMITE
author: COINAMITE
content: Hi Bitcointalk!This is my first topic hereÂ  So i have a few question. 1.What can i mine with the following specs?2. What operating system would be the best?3. How much would it generate pr day?192vCPU384Gib Memory Thanks for taking the time to read this!

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: You are in Bitcoin mining support and Bitcoin is no longer able to mine with a PC or CPU/GPU. Mining Bitcoin can only able to mine with ASIC machines like Antminer or USB miner(Compact F as sample).Better start reading this First time/Small miner reference for getting started.
